issue.reasoning: Register button changed to 'Sign Up' with no corresponding JIRA ticket

jira_ticket.title: UI Regression: Register button changed to 'Sign Up' without approval
jira_ticket.description:
The 'Register' button on the user registration page has been changed to 'Sign Up' without any corresponding JIRA ticket or approval. This change has not been documented or approved, leading to potential confusion for users.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to the user registration page.
2. Observe the button labeled 'Sign Up'.

Expected Behavior:
- The button should be labeled 'Register' as per the design specifications.

Actual Behavior:
- The button is labeled 'Sign Up', which deviates from the approved design.

This issue needs immediate attention to ensure consistency in the user interface and to align with the approved design specifications.

issue.reasoning: Header added per UI-004 but About link not positioned on extreme right as specified

jira_ticket.title: UI Regression: About link not positioned correctly in header
jira_ticket.description:
The About link in the header is not positioned on the extreme right as specified in the UI-004 requirements. This issue affects the overall layout and user experience.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to the homepage.
2. Observe the header section.

Expected Behavior:
- The About link should be positioned on the extreme right of the header.

Actual Behavior:
- The About link is not positioned on the extreme right, causing layout issues.
